Package net.tangly.ui.components

Class InternalEntitiesView<T extends net.tangly.core.NamedEntity>

java.lang.Object
com.vaadin.flow.component.Component
com.vaadin.flow.component.orderedlayout.VerticalLayout
net.tangly.ui.components.Crud<T>
net.tangly.ui.components.EntitiesView<T>
net.tangly.ui.components.InternalEntitiesView<T>
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.vaadin.flow.component.AttachNotifier, com.vaadin.flow.component.ClickNotifier<com.vaadin.flow.component.orderedlayout.VerticalLayout>, com.vaadin.flow.component.DetachNotifier, com.vaadin.flow.component.HasComponents, com.vaadin.flow.component.HasElement, com.vaadin.flow.component.HasEnabled, com.vaadin.flow.component.HasOrderedComponents, com.vaadin.flow.component.HasSize, com.vaadin.flow.component.HasStyle, com.vaadin.flow.component.orderedlayout.FlexComponent, com.vaadin.flow.component.orderedlayout.ThemableLayout, Serializable, CrudForm<T>, HasIdView<T>, SelectedItemListener<T>
public abstract class InternalEntitiesView<T extends net.tangly.core.NamedEntity> extends EntitiesView<T> implements CrudForm<T>, HasIdView<T>
The entity form provides an interface to all fields of an entity instance. The fields are grouped in tabs.
  • The overview panel shows the regular fields of an entity.
  • The comments panel shows all comments associated with the entity. This panel is a Crud< Comment> instance.
  • The tags panel shows all tags associated with the entity. This panel is a Crud<Tag> instance.
See Also:
  • Serialized Form

    • InternalEntitiesView

      public InternalEntitiesView(@NotNull @NotNull Class<T> clazz, @NotNull @NotNull Crud.Mode mode, @NotNull @NotNull net.tangly.core.providers.Provider<T> provider, net.tangly.core.TypeRegistry registry)
      Constructor of the CRUD view for a subclass of entity.
      Parameters:
      clazz - class of the entity to display
      mode - mode in which the view should be displayed, the active functions will be accordingly configured
      provider - data provider associated with the grid
      registry - tag type registry used to configure the tags view of the entity class
